issue.title: [Doc] Improve documentation on usage of Schema metadata and usage/limitations in Execplan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15543](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15543). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Schema metadata can be an important aspect related to computation and maintaining states. How this is affected in the execution plan and how it needs to be handled can be further documented.
